long_description: The Elie Strait 120 kayak supplies everything needed to get away from it all-except, or course, an excuse to go paddling! V-shaped, swede-form hull and extended keel help the Elie Strait 120 kayak glide through the water, and hard chines enhance edged turns and maneuverability. 3-layer polyethylene includes a special resin in the top layer, resulting in an unusually stiff, light and responsive watercraft. Specialized thermoforming process fuses together the deck and the hull under high pressure and heat. Soft padded seat ensures you have a fun, comfortable paddle. Backrest supports your paddle stroke with noticeable flex, and you can adjust the height to dial in the support. Padded cockpit offers comfort for your knees and thighs. Large footbraces adjust to ensure a comfortable paddling position. Extended keel enhances tracking. Day hatch behind cockpit includes a small dry bag to help protect splash-sensitive items. Quick-lock hatch covers on bow and stern hatches feature a hinged design and locking lever; to open hatch, simply slide lever to unlock cover and flip open to access gear. Bow and stern bulkheads helps keep contents of hatches dry and organized. Includes a bottle holder, reflective perimeter lines, bungee storage and carry handles that fit into your hands.
short_description: The Elie Strait 120 kayak supplies everything needed to get away from it all-except, or course, an excuse to go paddling!
